title: Christmas star biscuits
ingredients: ['Plain Dough', '250g plain flour', '100g caster sugar', '125g soft butter or margarine', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon grated orange zest', 'Chocolate Dough', '250g plain flour', '125g caster sugar', '125g soft butter or margarine', '20g unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 tablespoon milk', '1 egg', '1 egg white', 'icing sugar for dusting']
